definitions.definition: The lightest chemical element ( symbol H ), with an atomic number of 1 and atomic weight of 1.008.
Molecular hydrogen (H 2 ), a colourless , odourless and flammable gas at room temperature.

subdefinitions.definition: A molecule of this molecular species

definitions.definition: The isotope hydrogen-1 ( protium ) (symbol H or H), contrasting with deuterium and tritium

main_definition: The lightest chemical element ( symbol H ), with an atomic number of 1 and atomic weight of 1.008.
secondary_definitions: Molecular hydrogen (H 2 ), a colourless , odourless and flammable gas at room temperature.
The isotope hydrogen-1 ( protium ) (symbol H or H), contrasting with deuterium and tritium
